definition[0]: one of the very large areas of sea on the Earth’s surface
explanation[0]: You use in the ocean to talk about things that happen in the water
example[2]: There are thousands of species of fish in the ocean
explanation[1]: You use on the ocean to talk about things that happen on the surface of the water
example[3]: He dreamed of buying a yacht and sailing on the ocean
explanation[2]: You use by the ocean to talk about the area near the ocean
example[4]: I’d love to live by the ocean
